is a small market town in

This is walking country. The countryside is the attraction, with rolling hills and beautiful rural scenes all around you.  The Offa's Dyke Trail runs north to south across the area from Knighton in Powys through to Montgomery (also in Powys) across the westerly bulge of Shropshire to the west of Craven Arms.

value: directions=Centre of Newcastle On Clun B4368

content=The Crown Inn is in Newcastle on Clun. It is a modest place but there are Comfy beds, a warm welcome, good beer, an interesting menu, all set in a delightful half timbered pub. It is recently redecorated by new owners (2009).
